title: Official Verification Channel
description: Whether it's an address, a phone call, or a message, let us confirm its authenticity for you. Peace of mind is the best partner on the road of investment.
searchPlaceholder: Enter the information to be verified
safetyTip1Desc: Choose the type you have concerns about.
safetyTip2Desc: Fill in the unique identifier such as URL, ID, etc. for the type.
safetyTip3Desc: When the submitted information is not recorded by us, we recommend that you immediately terminate any interaction with the other party.
